mapper.select: SELECT mo.order_id AS orderId, mo.order_no AS orderNo, mo.state_id AS stateId, mo.amount AS amount, mo.remark AS remark, mo.hospital_id AS hospitalId, mo.hospital_name AS hospitalName, mo.create_user_id AS createUserId, mo.create_user_name AS createUserName, mo.create_time AS createTime FROM mall_order mo WHERE 1 = 1 AND mo.order_id = #{orderId} AND mo.order_no = #{orderNo} AND mo.state_id = #{stateId}
